revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=RPF |model=Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 |revision=RPi-CM4 (CM4002008) |manuf_country=UK |is_manuf=No |price=40 |est_release_date=08/2020 |type=SoM |pwr_v=5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2711 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM8G1GETF-B041 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4F6E3S4HMMGCJ |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54210PE |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5 Output Universal PMIC;MaxLinear (Exar);MxL7704;;1; }} {{TagLine|Compute Module 4}} :[https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-4/?variant=raspberry-pi-cm4002008 Product page]
"Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4" and "Made in the UK" are silkscreened on board top.
===Links=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/19/raspberry-pi-cm4-cm4lite-modules/ ''Raspberry Pi CM4 and CM4Lite Modules Launched'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/raspberry-pi-cm4-launches-with-smaller-footprint-quad-a72-cpu-and-optional-wifi/''Raspberry Pi CM4 launches with smaller footprint'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 @1.5GHz :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A72) *GPU: [[Broadcom]] VideoCore VI @500MHz :OpenGL ES 3.1, Vulkan 1.0, :H.265 (HEVC) (up to 4Kp60 decode), :H.264 (up to 1080p60 decode, 1080p30 encode) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port via connectors *Power Source: 5V via connectors
__NOTOC__
